channel.title: [help] out of combat... [help]

item.title: [help] out of combat... [help]
item.dc:creator: @X-X_G_X-X X-X--G--X-X
item.description:
@X-X_G_X-X wrote:

I am trying to make it so when a player clicks on an object, that have to be out of combat for it to teleport them. So if they are in combat it says “you cannot leave until your out of combat”… and if they are out of combat it teleports them when they click the ovject. Here is my object code:

		if ((objectID == 10865) && (objectX == 2916) && (objectY == 3627)) {
			// gate out of pk circle
			toX = 2916;
			toY = 3630;

Read full topic
